Affluent.details: Affluent worlds are rich in natural resources and have a high standard of living. They are often industrialized and produce a lot of manufactured goods.

Asphalt.details: Asphalt worlds are covered in roads and highways. They are often industrialized and produce a lot of manufactured goods.

Automobiles.details: Automobile worlds are covered in roads and highways. They are often industrialized and produce a lot of manufactured goods.
